units.title: First Floor
units.description: First floor, 2-bedroom apartment in a desirable location in Bellevue. Huge living room with decorative fireplace. Updated bathroom with stained-glass window. Large master bedroom with plenty of closet space. Large, eat-in kitchen with range, refrigerator and dishwasher and plenty of cabinet space. Custom blinds throughout. Central A/C. Huge back porch and yard. Off-street parking in back. Equipped laundry and clean storage in basement. Washer and dryer provided for tenantsâ€™ use. Additional room in basement which can be used for office, etc.

units.title: Second Floor
units.description: Triplex building. Beautiful, large 2nd floor, 2 bedroom apartment in a convenient location in Bellevue. Large living room with built-in bookcases and decorative fireplace. Large, equipped kitchen with center island and plenty of cabinet space. Dishwasher, stove and refrigerator included. Beautiful master bedroom with decorative fireplace and built-in bookcase and stained-glass window. Equipped laundry in basement with plenty of storage space too. Washer and dryer are provided and are NOT coin-operated. Central A/C. Large back balcony and yard. Old world charm abounds in this apartment!

units.title: Third Floor
units.description: Triplex building. Spacious, two bedroom, 3rd floor apartment. Large entry. Living room. Bathroom (shower only). Built-ins. Lots of storage space. Kitchen with newer appliances. Separate utilities (all electric apartment). Large front balcony. Equipped laundry room IN APARTMENT. Central air conditioning. Yard. Private back deck. Off-street parking in back.

houses.feel: Comfortable triplex located on a quiet street in Bellevue. Large backyard. Front/back porches. Both on and off street parking. Smoke free. Large basement with washer & dryer.
Beautiful duplex located on a quiet street in Bellevue. Large backyard, front porch porches. Both on and off street parking. Smoke free. Equipped with washer & dryer.
